评论概述: Comfy Great Look. Goes with pretty much everything.
评论详情: This top is incredibly comfortable. It looks great with alone or in layers. Stitching all looks to be good with no loose seams. It's held up to multiple washes with no abnormal pilling or stretching.

I LOVE THIS TOP!!!! Trust me when I say that it’s so versatile! Throw it together with a pair of jeans, leggings, sweats and it dresses up your outfit! I ordered a large because I wanted it to be a bit roomy. The quality of the material is really really nice!! It’s a waffle design and not thin material. It wears nicely and hangs over areas that you might want to cover up. The sleeves have a little cap at the end so if you needed to pull them up, the will stay up. It’s really a darling top and I can’t say enough about it. I don’t put mine in the dryer but it’s a preferred choice. It’s somewhat a heavier lifting top, meaning…it’s not cheaply made which is why it feels a bit heavier material than others. I ordered the apricot which came in a more of a creamy look than what the photo shows. All in all, the top is good quality material and I love it and so will you!
